entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • feature request: "dotnet format" mode that only formats code #23641
  • dotnet tools do not support differing entitlements than the dotnet muxer on Mac #23640
  • PackageValidation is causing unnecessary project evaluations which noticeably slows down a project's build #23630
  • `ApplicationManifest` is not respected when building for Windows on Linux #23627

Closed

  • reenable tests blocked by the install script bug #23531
    6.0.3xx
  • With .NET 7, unable to repair deleted files after executing "dotnet workload repair" #23503

PullRequests

Created

  • Include fsharp core #23629
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Prevent errors when building a 5.0 app with .cshtml.css files #23636
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Allow pdb deltas to be applied to Blazor WASM app #23581
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Backport System.CommandLine updates to 6.0.3xx #23345
    Area-CLI, 6.0.3xx

Updated

  • GenerateRuntimeConfig now uses stream serialization instead of loading file in memory #22576
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Enable additional test projects to run on helix #23381
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'main' #23604
    Area-Infrastructure
